scripts.build: npm run tsc && mv "$(npm pack | tail -n 1)" imakeltd-range-seek-bar.tgz
scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link @imakeltd/range-seek-bar && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && ns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && ns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ios.ng: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-ng && ns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android.ng: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-ng && ns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && ns plugin remove @imakeltd/range-seek-bar && ns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: cd ../demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf node_modules && npm run plugin.link
